thread.title: Gaggia Brera buyer
thread.title_full: WholeLatteLove.com reviewed by Gaggia Brera buyer

author: Gaggia Brera buyer
title: Gaggia Brera buyer
text: I used the excellent information on their website to choose an espresso machine that was right for my needs. The machine was delivered promptly which was important since it was a Christmas present. When we had an issue with the machine, their customer service was able to help. No need to return the machine and it now works great.
